IMIT (Information Management Issue Tracker) is an internal interface used by the department to capture, track, and manage issues related to information management and technology. It allows employees to report problems, request support, or log concerns, ensuring that they are documented and addressed efficiently by the appropriate teams. IMIT streamlines issue resolution and enhances the departmentâ€™s ability to maintain effective and organized information management systems.
